short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extra features for Infinite Craft on neal.fun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It adds the following extra features:
- Type to search (no need to click the search bar)
- Press Enter to insert first result into the playing field
- Press Esc to clear the search bar
- Shift + drag to clone items on the field (great for trying multiple combinations with the same item)

This extension is compatible with the helper script from Mikarific (https://github.com/Mikarific/InfiniteCraftHelper). Pressing enter now will insert the first search result, ignoring any pinned items.

v1.2.0 - 2024.02.27 - removed my dark mode due to the game now having it

v1.1.0 - 2024.02.23 - compatibility release
- made compatibile with the helper script from https://github.com/Mikarific/InfiniteCraftHelper
- greatly reduced extension size (98% smaller than v1.0.0)

v1.0.0 - 2024.02.15 - initial release
- darkmode
- type to search
- enter to inster first result
- esc to clear search
- shift drag item to duplicate
